name: War Robots Shooting Simulator
description:
This magnificent game, set in the depths of space, will take you to a distant planet in the year 2140. On this planet, in a world where robots have betrayed their colonies, you are called to duty to become heroes. Great graphics and realistic sound effects introduce you to this unique world, allowing you to create your robot hero and join the battle.

Be a Warrior of Freedom and Justice

Before starting the game, you can equip your war robot with your desired weapons. Whichever weapons you choose, the stronger you will be. This opens the doors to a strategic game and gives you a superior advantage against the game's formidable enemies. Your chosen weapons can take you forward in the game or set you back. That's why you should be very careful when selecting a gun.

Two Different Robots, Endless Adventure

There are two different robot options in the game. It's up to you to decide which robot to start with. Each robot has its unique abilities and characteristics. You can save your planet by choosing the robot you want.

Determine Your Strategy

Thanks to the in-game minimap, you can view the map of the planet from above. This is a handy feature for tracking enemies and determining your strategy. Additionally, thanks to your robot equipped with rockets, you can fly anywhere on the planet. Fight from any angle you want!

Different Perceptions

There are two different camera modes in the game. If you want, you can choose the cockpit camera, which is an FPS camera, or you can choose to play with the third-person camera. Whichever camera mode you prefer, you can experience the battle through your own eyes or by watching your robot. This adds a more realistic experience to the game and increases your adrenaline.

While the War Robots Shooting Simulator offers a fun and educational gaming experience, it is designed in a language that children can understand. With great graphics, the ability to fly freely, and strategic depth, this game is an excellent choice for those who love robot games, war games, and mechs simulation.

If you want to join this epic war full of robots, try War Robots Shooting Simulator now and join this fight in the depths of space!
